name: Rocky Romance
description:
Rocky Romance is a split-screen 3D top down game where the player controls two characters moving in tandem. The goal of the game is to collect 6 shards, 3 for each character, to fill up each character's heart. 

Credits: 

Kyper Bezanson: Mechanics, Music

Spencer Bryant: Modeling, Rigging, Animation, Textures, UI/UX 

Emily Hotz: Mechanics, Build 

Lawrence Soberanis: Level Design, Modeling, Textures, UI/UX 

Controls:

Move: WASD / Left Gamepad Control Stick

Press Button: E / Right Gamepad Face Button

Reverse Controls: F / Top Gamepad Face Button

Select Left Control: Q / L & ZL Gamepad Buttons

Select Right Control: R / R & ZR Gamepad Buttons
